item.title: Line Boring and Bore Welding in Action
item.description: A demonstration of how line boring and bore welding restore worn components, improving fit and extending service life.

media:content.media:title: Line Boring and Bore Welding in Action
media:content.media:description: A demonstration of how line boring and bore welding restore worn components, improving fit and extending service life.

item.title: Machining a Custom Drive Coupling
item.description: The team machines a precision drive coupling, walking through setup, measurements, and machining steps.

item.title: Unboxing and Testing a New Metal Spray System
item.description: A look at setting up and testing a new metal spray system, highlighting its features, operation, and first impressions in the shop.

item.title: Machining a Flywheel Drive Plate for a CAT Engine
item.description: The team machines a precise flywheel drive plate for a high-power CAT engine, highlighting setup, measurements, and machining technique.

item.title: Repairing a Damaged Hydraulic Cylinder
item.description: A detailed look at assessing and restoring a heavily worn hydraulic cylinder, with each step of the repair process explained clearly.

item.title: Rebuilding a D10 Dozer Cylinder
item.description: A new barrel is fabricated for a D10 dozer’s hydraulic cylinder, demonstrating machining, fitting, and rebuild techniques.

item.title: Troubleshooting the Big Lathe
item.description: The team identifies and works through mechanical issues on a large lathe, explaining each diagnostic step.

item.title: Machining a New Barrel for a Hydraulic Cylinder
item.description: Part one of rebuilding a hydraulic cylinder, showing how a new barrel is measured, machined, and prepared for assembly.

item.title: Repairing a Cracked Telescopic Cylinder
item.description: A detailed look at restoring a damaged telescopic hydraulic cylinder, focusing on assessment and precise repair steps.

item.title: Shop-Made Tool: The Ultimate Cutter Build
item.description: Follow the machining process as a powerful custom cutter is designed and built in-house — combining creativity, precision, and engineering expertise.

item.title: Replacing a Cracked End on a Caterpillar D10 Dozer Bar
item.description: The crew takes on the challenge of replacing a cracked end on an equalizer bar for a Caterpillar D10 dozer, ensuring reliable operation under pressure.

item.title: This 50-Ton Excavator Has a Broken Bucket Tooth!
item.description: A 50-ton excavator comes in with a broken bucket tooth — see how expert welding and fitting bring this heavy-duty machine back to work.

item.title: Worn-out & Broken Cylinder Eye: Let's Fix That
item.description: Watch as the team repairs a damaged cylinder eye with precision machining, restoring strength and extending the component’s service life.

item.title: Franna Crane Project: Differential Inspection
item.description: The team inspects the Franna crane’s differentials, ensuring every component is ready for reliable performance and smooth operation.

item.title: Fitting the Nut on a Hydraulic Cylinder Rod
item.description: A step-by-step look at fitting and securing a nut on a hydraulic cylinder rod — a vital process for strength and reliability in heavy equipment.

item.title: Restoring a Vintage Huron Slotting Attachment
item.description: See how this classic Huron slotting attachment is rebuilt from the ground up, blending traditional craftsmanship with modern precision.

item.title: Repairing a Damaged Thread with Precision
item.description: Watch as the team restores a damaged thread to full strength, using expert machining skills and attention to detail to ensure a perfect fit.

item.title: Shop-Made Tool: Custom Bearing Puller
item.description: See how a custom bearing puller is designed and built in the shop — a clever, precise solution for tough machining and engineering tasks.

item.title: Franna Crane Project: Hydraulic Pump Bracket Build
item.description: Follow the fabrication of a custom hydraulic pump bracket for the Franna crane, showcasing hands-on engineering and problem-solving in action.

item.title: Franna Crane Rebuild: Splitting It for Repairs
item.description: A detailed look at the process of separating the Franna crane for maintenance — precision engineering at its finest.
